name: SCP: Warhead Escape v0.1.0
description:
Introduction

The warhead will blow in 90 seconds!
You have to reach the surface zone and get in to the shelter!

But, many parts of the facility are broken. You need to fix these systems if it is blocking your way.

You only need 90 seconds for 1 play!

Credits

    SCP - Containment Breach (scpcbgame.com)
